name: vcoder
description: VSCode 智能编程助手插件 (支持 Claude Code / Codex CLI)
author: VCoder Team

scripts.package:plugin: cd apps/vscode-extension && pnpm package:server && pnpm dlx @vscode/vsce package --no-dependencies --out vcoder.vsix
scripts.build:app: pnpm -C packages/shared build && pnpm -C packages/server build && pnpm -C apps/desktop-shell/webview build && pnpm -C apps/desktop-shell build
